messages.messageBody:
shantinik@e...> wrote: Kim, I am speaking somewhere around Stamford on
October 10th, in Hartford on October 11th, and then down in Garden City, Long
Island on October
12th. (It's true, I've never spoken in Connecticut before, and very, very
rarely get to the northeast.)

That's wonderful! We can't wait to go!

Do you have a place where you will be posting the time and place that you
will be speaking?

We'll be in Connecticut from NH on those dates so that works out perfect.
Looking forward to it. Thanks!

Kim

and

I am speaking somewhere around Stamford on October 10th, in Hartford
on October 11th, and then down in Garden City, Long Island on October
12th. (It's true, I've never spoken in Connecticut before, and very,
very rarely get to the northeast.)

messages.subject: Cleveland/Toledo/??? August 15
messages.msgSnippet: So, I have this little homeschooling mini-speaking tour planned, and with a little hole in the middle. I am speaking in Pittburgh the afternoon and evening of
messages.messageBody:
So, I have this little homeschooling mini-speaking tour planned, and
with a little hole in the middle. I am speaking in Pittburgh the
afternoon and evening of Thursday, August 14th, and in Columbus, Ohio
the afternoon and evening of Saturday, August 16th. So, have car,
will travel.

I am hoping to set up a speaking engagement for folks who would be
interested in having me anywhere from Cleveland/Akron/(Erie?) to
Toledo (Detroit would be real stretch, but theoretically possible), on
the afternoon/evening of Friday, August 15th. I promise that it will
be fun (and, hopefully, educational!) . You can read about what I like
to talk about on my site ? www.skylarksings.com

Anyhow, if you are intrigued, just e-mail me and we can kibbitz some,
and see if we can make it happen. (I think there are some folks on
this list who can vouch for me....)

Thanks!

David (you can e-mail me privately at shantinik@...)
